rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0001
rows.name: Wow, what a view!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0002
rows.name: Are you happy now, Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0003
rows.name: Hey, not a bad view!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0004
rows.name: Whatcha think, Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0005
rows.name: A spectacular vista.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0006
rows.name: Penny for your thoughts, Kubira?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0007
rows.name: Okay, wow, this is something else.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0008
rows.name: You'd better be happy now, Kubira!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0009
rows.name:
Hmm...
To be frank, it does not live up
to my expectations.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0010
rows.name:
I must doubt the tastes of the one
who deemed this view spectacular.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0011
rows.name:
But surely you must agree that
it's not terrible?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0012
rows.name:
Well... Perhaps a commoner would
find it agreeable.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0013
rows.name: Wha- Excuse me? Commoner?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0014
rows.name: Oh, don't take it so hard.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0015
rows.name:
It is only natural that I should
possess more exacting sensibilities
than your like.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0016
rows.name:
So we should look for prettier place
to make Kubira happy happy?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0017
rows.name: Your kindness is wasted on me.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0018
rows.name:
The manner of spectacular view
I seek is not something one can
simply happen upon.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0019
rows.name:
I wouldn't want to waste your
precious time.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0020
rows.name: Hana have question for Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0021
rows.name: You may speak.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0022
rows.name: Why Kubira always such negative?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0023
rows.name:
It true, Kubira always look like he not
caring. Always acting high and mighty,
but never seem motivated!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0024
rows.name: Your expectations seem misguided.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0025
rows.name:
Why should one such as myself be
forced to expend precious energy?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0026
rows.name:
In battle, it important to act like life
is on line.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0027
rows.name:
It true! Need to give all in battle or
might end up food for monsters!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0028
rows.name:
Then that would be my Driver's
negligence, would it not?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0029
rows.name:
In which case, it is the Driver who
needs to be thoroughly motivated.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0030
rows.name:
It makes no sense that I should give my
all while my Driver is lacking.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0031
rows.name:
Big shock! Tora never heard argument
like that before!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0032
rows.name:
My, I really had no idea that a Blade
could think that way. I don't have the
words...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0033
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0034
rows.name: You act like you're some kind of king.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0035
rows.name: Maybe I don't want to be your Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0036
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0037
rows.name: You act like you're a king, Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0038
rows.name: I've had enough of you, Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0039
rows.name: How shall I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0040
rows.name: You act like you're a king, Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0041
rows.name: Kubira, this is where we part ways.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0042
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0043
rows.name: You really lord it over everyone, huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0044
rows.name: I've had enough. Toodles, Kubira.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0101
rows.name: Of course I do.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0102
rows.name: I am the ruler of a nation.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0103
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0104
rows.name: Eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0105
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0106
rows.name: Come again?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0107
rows.name:
Kubira ruler of country?
First Tora hear of it!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0108
rows.name:
A Blade can't be a king.
That's not possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0109
rows.name:
To be precise, I was King before I
became a Blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0110
rows.name:
Properly speaking, it is a crime for a
mere Driver to wield one of my
standing.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0111
rows.name:
But it'd be more terrible yet if my Driver
were to perish in battle, so I endure this
humiliation with magnanimity.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0112
rows.name:
But hang on... There's no way you can
still have your past memories!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0113
rows.name:
Whether I have memories or not is
insignificant.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0114
rows.name:
What matters is that I was,
without doubt, a ruler.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0115
rows.name:
No doubt someday you will come
across vestiges of my once great reign.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0116
rows.name: Ohhh boy.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0201
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0202
rows.name: You wish to expel me?!

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0203
rows.name:
A mere retainer wishes to abandon
their king?

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0301
rows.name: It is I who should be displeased.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0302
rows.name:
But to my good fortune, I now
understand something.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0303
rows.name:
I had long wondered why you
did not show me the respect
I should rightfully command.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0304
rows.name:
To think that you had not recognized
my noble lineage, my kingly presence...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0305
rows.name:
But now you see, yes?
It is beneath me to exert myself
in service to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0306
rows.name:
I will apply my full capabilities only
when I myself see fit.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0307
rows.name:
Until such time, I trust you will
take care of all menial tasks.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0308
rows.name:
Are we clear on that? Good.
Now do not bother me with
trifling issues any longer.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0309
rows.name: Uh, right...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0310
rows.name: Uh, right...

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0311
rows.name: Have it your way.

rows.label: kizunatalk060_msg0312
rows.name: Oooo...kay then?
